metadata.description: Religious texts from The Bible to the Sumerian tablets speak of strange creatures descending from the heavens and mating with humans, their children the superhuman heroes of myth. None of this ever meant anything to Iraq War veteran Hannah Gregory, until she found herself in the crosshairs of a dangerous cult convinced that she's a descendant of these dangerous bloodlines... bloodlines they're determined to eradicate. No Angel is a cosmological and conspiratorial modern western with super powers by way of The Da Vinci Code.
metadata.name: No Angel
